query:
SELECT 
  uniqueId, 
  title, 
  documentRequired,
  documentCount,
  documentDescription
FROM taskTemplates 
WHERE uniqueId IN ('SP-2026-001', 'SP-2026-003', 'SP-2026-004', 'SP-2026-006', 'SP-2026-007')
   OR title = 'Vertrag prüfen'
ORDER BY uniqueId;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 43dcVLjT8BtYBTF.073b9f7b405e --database Qtfyr7BgTHqDyUMajEnzSf --execute SELECT 
  uniqueId, 
  title, 
  documentRequired,
  documentCount,
  documentDescription
FROM taskTemplates 
WHERE uniqueId IN ('SP-2026-001', 'SP-2026-003', 'SP-2026-004', 'SP-2026-006', 'SP-2026-007')
   OR title = 'Vertrag prüfen'
ORDER BY uniqueId;

rows.title: Vertrag prüfen
rows.documentDescription: Laden Sie den zu prüfenden Vertrag als PDF oder DOCX hoch.
